page.title: 18BOATS
page.content: BY MAY THIS YEAR FOUR BOATS HAD BEEN LAUNCHED WHICH WERE CONNECTED WITH BRIDGE END. THE "BE READY" AND THE "ADONIS" ARE BOTH FISHING BOATS LAUNCHED IN CAMPBELTOWN AND WITH SKIPPERS FROM BRIDGE END. MOST OF THE OWNERS AND CREW OF THE "ADONIS" ALSO LIVE IN BRIDGE END. "SCOTTIE'S PRIDE" AND "BOY ADRIAN" ARE SMALLER BOATS , BUILT IN BRIDGE END , THE FIRST BY TWO LOCAL MEN OVER A PERIOD OF TIME AND THE SECOND BY A LOCAL BUILDER. ONE WAS LAUNCHED AT HAMNAVOE, THE OTHER AT SCALLOWAY. BOTH THE FISHING BOATS CALLED IN AT HAMNAVOE BEFORE STARTING FISHING TO LET LOCAL PEOPLE SEE THEM AND CELEBRATE THEIR LAUNCHING. THEY NOW FISH FROM SCALLOWAY. "SCOTTIE'S PRIDE" GOES TO SCALLOP FISHING AND "BOY ADRIAN" TO THE LOBSTER CREELS.
